name: Goblin Attack!
description:
Gameplay

Your village is being attacked by goblins. If five of them reaches the bridge it's all over. You can gain gold by growing crops and unlocking buildings.

How long will you last?

Controls

Hold escape to exit the game. (or press alt + F4)

Press F1 to hide/reveal the pause menu.

Other

Font used.

Special thanks for Griplex for the music!

This game was created as part of the miz jam 1.
